argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fin1a2lem.a | |- S = ( x e. On |-> suc x ) |
| 2 |  | #P_suceloni | |- ( A e. On -> suc A e. On ) |
| 3 |  | #P_suceq | |- ( a = A -> suc a = suc A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_suceq | |- ( x = a -> suc x = suc a ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_cbvmptv | |- ( x e. On |-> suc x ) = ( a e. On |-> suc a ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqtri | |- S = ( a e. On |-> suc a ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( A e. On /\ suc A e. On ) -> ( S ` A ) = suc A ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_mpdan | |- ( A e. On -> ( S ` A ) = suc A ) |
